content.rendered: The stickmen must strike at the terror enemy stickmen in this Battle SimulatorThe stickmen terror forces must be stopped with a tactical strike! You are the battle commander of the counter terrorist stickman (CTS) forces.▶TABS simulator – style gameplay▶3D stickmen, levels and gun models▶Help win the stickman war.. on terror!▶Accurate stickman tacticsSounds: Freesound.orgMusic_cornandbeans_generic_techno
